name: file-browser
title: File Browser
description: Browse and manage your Mac's files without leaving Raycast
author: paakjong

commands.name: browse-directory
commands.title: Browse Directory
commands.subtitle: File Browser
commands.description: Browse folders, review rich metadata, and take action from a responsive list or grid.

preferences.name: startDirectory
preferences.title: Start Directory
preferences.description: Choose the directory to browse when the command opens.

preferences.name: viewMode
preferences.title: Default View Mode
preferences.description: Set the initial layout for items.

preferences.name: gridColumns
preferences.title: Grid Columns
preferences.description: Number of columns to use in grid view.

preferences.name: sortMode
preferences.title: Default Sort
preferences.description: Set how items are ordered initially.

preferences.name: showAttrChanged
preferences.title: Appearance
preferences.label: Show Attribute Changed
preferences.description: Show attribute change date as an accessory.

preferences.name: showContentChanged
preferences.label: Show Content Changed
preferences.description: Show content change date as an accessory.

preferences.name: showCreated
preferences.label: Show Created
preferences.description: Show creation date as an accessory.

preferences.name: showSize
preferences.label: Show File Size
preferences.description: Show file size as an accessory.

preferences.name: showLastUsed
preferences.label: Show Last Used
preferences.description: Show last used date in list accessories.

scripts.build:native: cd native && cargo build --release && rm -f ../assets/mditems && cp target/release/mditems ../assets/ && chmod +x ../assets/mditems
scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
